attributes.action: Make suspects of crimes who are given police bail pay a `bail bond`, which will be forfeited in the case of their non-appearance in court.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The present bail system is a joke because hundreds of suspected offenders, given pre-trial bail,fail to turn up at court. This then adds more costs to the tax payer in trying to bring them to court to answer the charges against them. A bail bond system will go some way to cover these extra costs.
